timeline.message:
Small Modifcations

- Changed event syntax
- Reordered event value registration
- Updated 'repair amount' docs

timeline.bodyText:
What do you think about changing this to something like "Mending Repair Amount"?
Im only suggesting this, as "Repair Amount" is a bit vague and could easily confuse users, who might think this is for repairing in other scenarios
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

replies.bodyText: Good idea! I'll make the change.
replies.author: APickledWalrus

timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.bodyText: Dunno how I missed this, you going back in time? haha, as Im sure you know this should be "INSERT VERSION"
timeline.author: ShaneBeee
Wealthyturtle

timeline.bodyText: Might the RESET ChangeMode be applicable here?
timeline.author: Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText: It might be possible if I get the ExperienceOrb actually. I'll have to test that out.
replies.author: APickledWalrus
